753.title: testing task - commit a change that fixes anything
753.description: this a testing task, find any real ISSUE in the code-base and complete it
753.lastAgentOutput:
**Summary**
Updated `pkg/security/command_validator.go` to avoid leaking timeout contexts by only applying the default timeout inside `Run` when a caller passes a nil context, while keeping `SafeCommand` context-neutral. Pushed `ve/753-testing-task-commit-a-change-that-fixes-`.

**Tests**
1. `gofmt -w pkg/security/command_validator.go`
2. `go vet ./pkg/security/...`
3. `go test ./pkg/security -count=1`
4. `go build ./...`
5. `node scripts/validate-agents-docs.mjs`
6. `golangci-lint run --new-from-rev=HEAD~1`
7. Pre-push hook suite (go vet, gofmt, golangci-lint, build, tests) ran on push with `CGO_ENABLED=0` to avoid missing `libudev.h` on the host and completed successfully.

  - scripts/codex-monitor/codex-shell.mjs
